item.title: Joining Invoke Studios as Principal Online Programmer
item.description:
After 3 eventful years at Haven, I’ve decided to take on an opportunity to advance as a Principal Online Programmer at .

Invoke is one of the game studios under the (WotC) family, a subsidiary of . WotC owns popular brands such as Magic: The Gathering and Dungeons & Dragons.

I’m joining a group of talented people working on an unannounced project, and will be developing its online tech stack for the years to come. I’ll be taking on more responsibilities compared to my previous jobs and I’m excited for the challenges ahead!

It was very kind of Invoke to welcome me with a special video clip on their social media platforms (posts: / ):

Hopefully in the near future we’ll unveil the game we’re working on. Stay tuned!

item.title: Starting a New Job at Haven Studios
item.description:
